articles.description: I am delighted to welcome the Adani Group and GMR onboard on our Ultimate Kho Kho journey,  said Tenzing Niyogi, CEO of Ultimate Kho Kho.  This is certainly a strong step forward for Ultimate Kho Kho becoming a sports movement.
articles.content: Mumbai: Ultimate Kho Kho, upcoming franchise-format kho kho league backed by 's Amit Burman, has secured Adani Group and GMR as two of its six team owners. While Adani Group purchased the Gujarat fra… [+1743 chars]
